data.name: _General_InvalidArgumentValue
data.value: Unsupport value '{0}' specified for parameter '{1}'.

data.name: _Recovery_InvalidRebuildShardSpecification
data.value: The specified ShardRange {0} was not in the set of ShardRanges from which the local shardmap information can be rebuilt at location '{1}'.

data.name: _Recovery_InvalidRecoveryToken
data.value: Recovery token {0} was not recognized.

data.name: _Recovery_ShardNotValid
data.value: The given location '{0}' does not have the necessary storage structures present for a shard. Error occurred while performing operation '{1}'.

data.name: _SchemaInfo_TableInfoAlreadyExists
data.value: The SchemaInfo object already contains a {0} table by the given name of [{1}].[{2}].

data.name: _ShardKey_MaxValueCannotBeIncremented
data.value: Shard key has maximum value which cannot be incremented. Perform the IsMax check on shard key before requesting next key.

data.name: _ShardKey_MaxValueCannotBeRepresented
data.value: Shard key has maximum value which cannot be represented. Perform the IsMax check on shard key before requesting a conversion.

data.name: _ShardKey_RequestedTypeDoesNotMatchShardKeyType
data.value: The requested type '{0}' does not match the shard key type '{1}'.

data.name: _ShardKey_ShardKeyTypesMustMatchForComparison
data.value: The data type of the shard key '{0}' does not match the data type of comparand shard key '{1}'. Comparison is only supported for shard keys with same type.

data.name: _ShardKey_UnsupportedShardKeyType
data.value: The specified ShardKeyType specified is not supported.

data.name: _ShardKey_UnsupportedType
data.value: Type not supported for shard keys.

data.name: _ShardKey_UnsupportedValue
data.value: The given value is of type '{0}' which is an unsupported shard key type.

data.name: _ShardKey_ValueDoesNotMatchShardKeyType
data.value: The type of specified value does not match the type specified in the '{0}' parameter.

data.name: _ShardKey_ValueLengthUnexpected
data.value: The length of raw value specified for the shard key ({0} bytes) does not match the expected length ({1} bytes) for the ShardKeyType ({2}) specified.

data.name: _ShardLocation_InvalidPort
data.value: The given port number '{0}' is invalid.

data.name: _ShardLocation_InvalidServerOrDatabase
data.value: The given '{0}' name is longer than the allowed length of '{1}' characters.

data.name: _ShardLocation_UnsupportedProtocol
data.value: The given protocol value '{0}' is not supported.

data.name: _ShardMapExtensions_AsTypedShardMap_ConversionFailure
data.value: Shard map '{0}' can not be converted to the target type {1}ShardMap<{2}>. Its actual type is {3}ShardMap<{4}>.

data.name: _ShardMapManager_DifferentShardMapManager
data.value: Shard map '{0}' is not associated with the current instance of shard map manager at '{1}'. Only shard maps that are obtained from the same 'ShardMapManager' instance can be used.

data.name: _ShardMapManager_ShardMapLookupFailed
data.value: Shard map '{0}' could not be found in the shard map manager store at '{1}'.

data.name: _ShardMapManager_UnsupportedShardMapName
data.value: Shard map name '{0}' is not supported. Shard map names are only allowed to contain unicode letters and digits.

data.name: _ShardMapManager_UnsupportedShardMapNameLength
data.value: Length of shard map name '{0}' exceeds the maximum allowed length of '{1}' characters.

data.name: _ShardMapping_DifferentShardMap
data.value: '{0}' provided for operation '{1}' is not associated with the current shard map '{2}'. Only mappings associated with the same shard map as the given shard map can be used. Error occurred for parameter '{3}'.

data.name: _ShardMapping_DifferentShardMapManager
data.value: '{0}' provided for operation '{1}' is not associated with the current instance of shard map manager at '{2}'. Only mappings associated with the same 'ShardMapManager' instance as the the one associated with current shard map '{3}' can be used. Error occurred for parameter '{4}'.

data.name: _ShardMapping_DifferentStatus
data.value: Mappings provided for the Merge operation belonging to shard map '{0}' differ in their Status property. Merge operation is only allowed for mappings with same values for Status.

data.name: _ShardMapping_LockIdNotSupported
data.value: LockId for locking the mapping referencing shard {0} with shard map name {1} has unsupported value '{2}'.

data.name: _ShardMapping_MergeDifferentShards
data.value: Mappings provided for the merge operation which belong to shard map '{0}' belong to different shards '{1}' and '{2}'. Merge operation is only allowed for mappings belonging to the same shard.

data.name: _ShardMapping_MergeNotAdjacent
data.value: Mappings provided for the merge operation are not adjacent. Merge operation is only allowed for adjacent mappings.

data.name: _ShardMapping_RangeNotProperSubset
data.value: Requested range is exactly the range for existing mapping. Operation is only allowed for proper subsets of existing range.

data.name: _ShardMapping_RangeNotSubset
data.value: Requested range is not a subset of the existing range mapping.

data.name: _ShardMapping_SplitPointOutOfRange
data.value: Split point lies on the boundary or outside of the specified range mapping.

data.name: _ShardMap_GetShard_ShardDoesNotExist
data.value: Shard corresponding to location '{0}' could not be found in shard map '{1}' .

data.name: _ShardMap_OpenConnectionForKey_KeyTypeNotSupported
data.value: Key values of type '{0}' are not supported. OpenConnectionForKey requests for the shard map '{1}' requires keys of type '{2}'.

data.name: _ShardMap_OpenConnection_ConnectionStringPropertyDisallowed
data.value: Property '{0}' must not be set in the input connection string for 'OpenConnection' operations.

data.name: _ShardRange_LowGreaterThanOrEqualToHigh
data.value: The low value {0} is greater than or equal to the high value {1}. Lower value must be less than the higher value.

data.name: _Shard_DifferentShardMap
data.value: Shard '{0}' provided for the given '{1}' is not associated with current shard map '{2}'. The '{3}' operations required the shard to be associated with the current shard map.

data.name: _Shard_DifferentShardMapManager
data.value: Shard '{0}' provided for the given '{1}' is not associated with current shard map manager at '{2}'. The '{3}' operations required the shard to be associated with the current shard map manager.

data.name: _SqlShardMapManagerCredentials_ConnectionStringPropertyRequired
data.value: The required property '{0}' must be set in the connection string.

data.name: _Store_MissingSprocParametersGlobal
data.value: All required parameters for operation '{0}' are not supplied. Error occurred while executing procedure '{1}' on the shard map manager database. Please verify and match library and store version.

data.name: _Store_MissingSprocParametersLocal
data.value: All required parameters for operation '{0}' at shard '{1}' are not supplied. Error occurred while executing procedure '{2}' on the shard. Please verify and match library and store version.

data.name: _Store_SchemaInfo_NameConflict
data.value: Unable to create schema info with name '{0}' as there is already an entry with the same name.

data.name: _Store_SchemaInfo_NameDoesNotExist
data.value: Unable to {0} schema info with name '{1}' since there is no entry by the given name.

data.name: _Store_ShardMapManager_AlreadyExistsGlobal
data.value: Data structures for shard map manager persistence already exists at the target location.

data.name: _Store_ShardMapManager_DoesNotExistGlobal
data.value: Data structures for shard map manager persistence do not exist at the target location.

data.name: _Store_ShardMapper_LockMappingAlreadyLocked
data.value: Mapping referencing shard '{0}' belonging to shard map '{1}' is already locked. Error occurred while executing procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}' on the shard map manager database. This can happen if another concurrent user locks the mapping.

data.name: _Store_ShardMapper_LockOwnerDoesNotMatch
data.value: Mapping referencing shard '{0}' belonging to shard map '{1}' is locked and correct lock token is not provided. Error occurred while executing procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}' on the shard map manager database. This can happen if another concurrent user locks the mapping.

data.name: _Store_ShardMapper_MappingDoesNotExistGlobal
data.value: Mapping referencing shard '{0}' in the shard map '{1}' does not exist. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}'. This can occur if another concurrent user has already removed the mapping.

data.name: _Store_ShardMapper_MappingIsNotOffline
data.value: Mapping referencing shard '{0}' in the shard map '{1}' has 'Online' status. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}'. Updates to a mapping involving modification of the shard location or removal require the mapping to be 'Offline'.

data.name: _Store_ShardMapper_MappingNotFoundForKeyGlobal
data.value: Mapping containing the given key value could not be located in the shard map '{0}'. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{1}' for operation '{2}'.

data.name: _Store_ShardMapper_MappingPointOrRangeAlreadyMapped
data.value: Mapping referencing shard '{0}' in the shard map '{1}' cannot be added because the {2} it covers is already mapped by another mapping. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{3}' for operation '{4}'. This can occur if another concurrent user has already added a mapping covering the given {2}.

data.name: _Store_ShardMapper_UnableToKillSessions
data.value: Mapping referencing shard '{0}' belonging to shard map '{1}' could not be taken offline because all existing connections on the shard could not be terminated. Error occurred during '{2}' operation while executing stored procedure '{3}' on shard '{4}'.

data.name: _Store_ShardMap_AlreadyExistsGlobal
data.value: Shard map with name '{0}' already exists in the store. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{1}' for operation '{2}'.

data.name: _Store_ShardMap_ContainsShardsGlobal
data.value: Shard map '{0}' has shards associated with it. Shard maps can only be removed if there are no shards associated with them. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{1}' for operation '{2}'.

data.name: _Store_ShardMap_DoesNotExistGlobal
data.value: Shard map '{0}' does not exist in the store. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{1}' for operation '{2}' for shard '{3}'. This can happen if another concurrent user deletes the shard map.

data.name: _Store_ShardMap_DoesNotExistLocal
data.value: Shard map '{0}' does not exist on shard '{1}'. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}'. This can happen if another concurrent user deletes the shard map.

data.name: _Store_Shard_AlreadyExistsGlobal
data.value: Shard '{0}' already exists in store for shard map '{1}'. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}'. This can happen when another concurrent user adds the shard to the store.

data.name: _Store_Shard_DoesNotExistGlobal
data.value: Shard '{0}' belonging to shard map '{1}' could not be found in the shard map manager database. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}'. This can happen when another concurrent user removes the shard from the store.

data.name: _Store_Shard_HasMappingsGlobal
data.value: Shard '{0}' belonging to shard map '{1}' has mappings associated with it. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}'. Remove all the mappings associated with the shard before attempting the operation.

data.name: _Store_Shard_LocationAlreadyExistsGlobal
data.value: Shard referecing location '{0}' already exists in store for shard map '{1}'. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}'. This can happen when another concurrent user has added a shard with specified location in store.

data.name: _Store_Shard_VersionMismatchGlobal
data.value: Shard '{0}' belonging to shard map '{1}' has been updated in store. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}'. This can occur if another concurrent user updates the shard. Perform a GetShard operation for the shard location to obtain the updated instance.

data.name: _Store_SqlExceptionGlobal
data.value: Store Error: {0}. The error occurred while attempting to perform the underlying storage operation during '{1}' operation on the shard map manager database. See the inner StoreException for details.

data.name: _Store_SqlExceptionLocal
data.value: Store Error: {0}. The error occurred while attempting to perform the underlying storage operation during '{1}' operation on shard '{2}'. See the inner StoreException for details.

data.name: _Store_SqlOperation_LockNotAcquired
data.value: Exclusive access to application resource '{0}' could not be acquired.

data.name: _Store_SqlOperation_LockNotReleased
data.value: Exclusive access to application resource '{0}' could not be released.

data.name: _Store_StoreException
data.value: Error occurred while performing store operation. See the inner SqlException for details.

data.name: _Store_UnexpectedErrorGlobal
data.value: Unexpected error code found while processing errors returned from the shard map manager store. This can occur because of a defect in the client library.

data.name: _Store_UnexpectedErrorLocal
data.value: Unexpected error code found while processing errors returned from the shard location '{0}'. This can occur because of a defect in the client library.

data.name: _Store_UnsupportedLibraryVersionGlobal
data.value: Shard map manager store version '{0}' is not compatible with the version '{1}' supported by client library. Please upgrade the {2}.

data.name: _Store_UnsupportedLibraryVersionLocal
data.value: Shard map manager store version '{0}' at shard '{1}' is not compatible with the version '{2}' supported by client library. Please upgrade the {3}.

data.name: _Store_Validate_MappingDoesNotExist
data.value: Mapping referencing shard '{0}' associated with shard map '{1}' no longer exists in store. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}' on the shard. This can happen if another concurrent user has deleted or modified the mapping.

data.name: _Store_Validate_MappingIsOffline
data.value: The shard key value for an OpenConnection request is associated with a mapping that is marked ‘Offline’. Data containing this key value is likely being moved, and the connection is blocked to avoid data corruption. Validated connection requests for this shardlet will succeed when the mapping is back ‘Online’. Shard: '{0}'. Shard map: '{1}'. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{3}' for operation '{2}' on the shard.

data.name: _Store_Validate_ShardDoesNotExist
data.value: Shard '{0}' belonging to shard map '{1}' no longer exists in store. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}' on the shard. This can happen if another concurrent user deletes the shard.

data.name: _Store_Validate_ShardMapDoesNotExist
data.value: Shard map '{0}' associated with shard '{1}' no longer exists in store. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}'. This can happen if another concurrent user deletes the shard map.

data.name: _Store_Validate_ShardVersionMismatch
data.value: Shard '{0}' belonging to shard map '{1}' has been modified in the store. Error occurred while executing stored procedure '{2}' for operation '{3}' on the shard. This can happen if another concurrent user performs modification operations on the shard or its associated mappings.
